class.name: Semaphore
class.description: A synchronization Semaphore. Element used in multi-threadding. Initialized to zero on creation.

method.name: post
method.description: Lowers the [code]Semaphore[/code], allowing one more thread in.

method.name: wait
method.description: Tries to wait for the [code]Semaphore[/code], if its value is zero, blocks until non-zero.
